# Sudowrite Documentation

> AI-optimized documentation for Sudowrite, the AI writing assistant for creative fiction authors.

## Overview

Sudowrite is an AI-powered writing partner designed to help authors achieve their writing goals. It functions as a junior writing assistant, editor, and creative companion that helps writers get unstuck, stay inspired, maintain organization, and speed up their creative process.

This documentation covers:
- Getting started with Sudowrite
- Account management and plans
- Core features and workflows
- Story Bible and Story Smarts
- Plugins and mobile app
- Resources and community

## Documentation Sections

### Getting Started

- [Interface](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/2044890-interface): Sudowrite’s main writing interface inside of a project is divided into 3 columns.

- [How many credits do features use?](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/6362317-how-many-credits-do-features-use): Since credit use is calculated based on a task’s complexity, different features on Sudowrite use ...
- [What are credits?](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/3330910-what-are-credits): Each Sudowrite plan tier receives a set amount of credits each month, and those credits are then ...
- [What if I need more credits?](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/9958048-what-if-i-need-more-credits): If you’ve exhausted your monthly credit allotment but would like to keep using Sudowrite’s AI fea...

- [What plans are available?](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/2690807-what-plans-are-available): Sudowrite offers three subscription tiers—so whether you’re a hobbyist or a working professional,...

- [Is there a mobile app?](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/4862190-is-there-a-mobile-app): Yes! We’ve just launched a mobile iOS app—and we’re currently in beta with our Android app as wel...
- [What accessibility options are available?](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/2943388-what-accessibility-options-are-available): We think that every writer should be empowered to tell their story, so there are a handful of fea...
- [Where do I submit feedback or feature requests?](https://feedback.sudowrite.com/help/articles/7573110-where-do-i-submit-feedback-or-feature-requests): Have some feedback for us, or a feature you’d love to see in Sudowrite? You can suggest a feature...
